title: 148863250.does It Matter
excerpt: Before you initiate your next project, before you invest your time in it, before it has any hope of becoming a tangible thing, consider:

children.text: Before you initiate your next project, before you invest your time in it, before it has any hope of becoming a tangible thing, consider:
If you were a random bystander out in the world today, would you watch this? Would you read it or consume it? Will this really make a tangible difference to someone in the world today?
If you can’t answer a resounding ‘yes,’ it raises the question:
